ing: 1/2 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
des: "An almost no-cook salad! If you do not like the idea of eating raw spinach, you can blanch it before shredding."
ins: Mix yogurt, sugar, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl. Add spinach and dates; stir to combine. Sprinkle with red pepper flakes.
